description: Manage a vCenter Single Sign On Identity Source of a  private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source create
commands.summary: Create a vCenter Single Sign On Identity Source to a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud identity-source create --alias
                                               --base-group-dn
                                               --base-user-dn
                                               --domain
                                               --name
                                               --password
                                               --primary-server
                                               --private-cloud
                                               --resource-group
                                               --username
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--secondary-server]
                                               [--ssl {Disabled, Enabled}]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source delete
commands.summary: Delete a vCenter Single Sign On Identity Source of a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud identity-source delete --name
                                               --private-cloud
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--yes]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source list
commands.summary: List vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources of a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source show
commands.summary: Show a vCenter Single Sign On Identity Source of a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source update
commands.summary: Update a vCenter Single Sign On Identity Source of a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware private-cloud identity-source update --name
                                               --private-cloud
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--add]
                                               [--alias]
                                               [--base-group-dn]
                                               [--base-user-dn]
                                               [--domain]
                                               [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                               [--password]
                                               [--primary-server]
                                               [--remove]
                                               [--secondary-server]
                                               [--set]
                                               [--ssl {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                               [--username]

commands.name: az vmware private-cloud identity-source wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
